item.title: Large potholes similar to photo., 30th November

item.title: " large pot holes back to back on a bending junction with a futher large potholed and cracked ground less than 100 meters afterwards, 29th November

item.title: When it rains the cover is incredibly slippery., 29th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jessop Avenue, Montpellier, Cheltenham
